_metadata.description: agent-metareasoning-manager operational requirements mapped to canonical PRD v2.0

requirements.title: Live reasoning session monitoring
requirements.description: Display active agent reasoning processes with real-time updates via WebSocket.

requirements.title: Decision tree visualization
requirements.description: Visual representation of reasoning chains and decision paths.

requirements.title: Performance metrics dashboard
requirements.description: Live charts for reasoning speed, accuracy, resource utilization.

requirements.title: Agent health status display
requirements.description: System vitals for each active reasoning agent.

requirements.title: Pattern selection interface
requirements.description: Quick access to reasoning patterns (SWOT, Pros/Cons, Risk Assessment).

requirements.title: Execution queue management
requirements.description: Manage pending and active reasoning tasks in queue.

requirements.title: Resource allocation monitoring
requirements.description: Monitor and control CPU, memory, model usage for reasoning agents.

requirements.title: History browser
requirements.description: Search and review past reasoning sessions with filtering.

requirements.title: Decision quality metrics
requirements.description: Track reasoning accuracy over time with trend analysis.

requirements.title: Pattern effectiveness comparison
requirements.description: Compare success rates of different reasoning frameworks.

requirements.title: Performance heatmaps
requirements.description: Visualize system load and bottlenecks across reasoning processes.

requirements.title: Trend analysis
requirements.description: Long-term patterns in agent decision-making with statistical insights.

requirements.title: Multi-agent orchestration
requirements.description: Coordinate reasoning across multiple agents with dependency management.

requirements.title: Custom reasoning patterns
requirements.description: Create and save custom reasoning frameworks for reuse.

requirements.title: Real-time collaboration
requirements.description: Multi-user monitoring and control with conflict resolution.

requirements.title: Advanced analytics export
requirements.description: Export reasoning data for external analysis in multiple formats.

requirements.title: Automated optimization
requirements.description: AI-driven reasoning workflow optimization based on performance data.
